steps.action: Type characters in search box and observe real-time filtering
steps.expected: Templates should filter in real-time as user types (with 500ms debounce delay)

issues: API endpoint /API/personaBar/Templates/GetPageTemplates returns HTTP 500 Internal Server Error
Front-end search event handlers are working (confirmed by network request logs)

observations: The Templates API endpoints (/API/personaBar/Templates/*) are returning HTTP 500 Internal Server Error for all requests
The Templates UI loads successfully but cannot display any data due to API failures
The search input field is present and functional - keystrokes are accepted and API calls are triggered
Network requests confirm that GetPageTemplates is called with searchKey parameter when searching
Code review shows correct search implementation: uses IndexOf with StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase for case-insensitive matching
Code review shows 500ms debounce delay (delayTime: 500) before search executes
Server-side issue prevents proper testing of all Template Search functionality
